channel.title: Runescape update
channel.description:
Far better anti-macro technology. Those cheats are in for one huge shock! :-)
Other updates this month include some new random events which ask the player to Grab the Evil Twin. Players operate a winch and crane with a large claw attached to the bottom â€“ similar to the games you can see at fairgrounds. We also see the player being whisked off to a large troll area having to prod the correct pillars, just like a giant pinball machine!
:eek: I wonder what that could mean, read runescape 2 may 2006 - behind the scenes for the full article. Let me guess? pure yews? or something ridiculous like a 2 hour random event? XD

item.title: Runescape update
item.dc:creator: @Athenrad Athenrad
item.description:
@Athenrad wrote:

He’s just been a c*cky **** ( excuse me ) 6 Months on it … sure, i bet you he sits there eating donuts all day. And everyone knows that the smilies with dashes as a nose went out of fashion ages ago. I cant see how on earth they think they can stop autoing, fair enough maybe put some people off but he’s trying to keep everyone happy. Also something about making chairs. Carpentry next month?

Read full topic

@kr0n1k wrote:

wouldnt mean aryan is dead would just mean thers some new trap that needs to be found most likely, id just lay low on the autoing for a few days

item.title: Runescape update
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Oh well. If it’s true, then aryan is going to be dead for a while. I’ll have to bot a bit and see. Cheating will never stop though.

Edit- ty, I wasn’t thinking I guess
